comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo of this lady speaking for the Fusion Ticket of New York Mayoral Candidate John Purroy Mitchel, who was victorious in the November election:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4408865756/]

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Gentlemen: I think that this photo is incorrectly captioned.  This woman is not Mrs. J. B. Harriman.  But then, who is she?  Pennylrichards suggested that this woman is Mrs. Charles Dana Gibson which is how the Bain service identified her, but I can't find an image of Mrs. Dana that corroborates her as a member of this group.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Ryan (LOC P&P): You refer to Mrs. Gibson using two different last names. Could this contribute to the difficulty in locating an image of her?

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks Wystan, for catching my mistake.  I should have said Mrs. Charles Dana Gibson and not Mrs. Dana.
